meanings.definition: To spray or squirt a small amount of liquid
meanings.sent1: She enjoys spritzing water on her plants every morning.
meanings.sent2: He was spritzing perfume on before going out.
meanings.sent3: The cat started spritzing the water from its bowl playfully.
meanings.sent4: The chef was spritzing lemon juice onto the salad like an artist.
meanings.sent5: The sound of spritzing water filled the air in the garden.

meanings.definition: The act of spraying or squirting a small amount of liquid
meanings.sent1: The spritzing of the cleaner made the room smell fresh.
meanings.sent2: She could hear the spritzing of the soda being poured into the glass.
meanings.sent3: The spritzing of the water fountain made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The spritzing of the mist reminded her of a gentle rain shower.
meanings.sent5: The gentle spritzing of the perfume left a pleasant scent in the room.
